properties.Name: RecipeFormula
properties.Description: Describes recipe process inputs (e.g., ingredients, quantities), process parameters (e.g., processing temperature, ingredient transfer rate, mixing speed ), and process outputs (the product and its quantity resulting from a single batch). Formulas can be used to distinguish between different products or different product "grades" defined by the same procedure.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Columns.Name: SequenceNumber
Columns.Description: The sequence in which the items are processed in the formula.

Columns.Name: IngredientId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient.

Columns.Name: Quantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of item required by the formula.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: FormulaActivityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a formula activity type.

Columns.Name: SubstituteIngredientIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the ingredient may be used in the recipe formula as a substitute or alternate for another ingredient.

Columns.Name: RecipeFormulaNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the recipe formula.

Properties.Description: Describes recipe process inputs (e.g., ingredients, quantities), process parameters (e.g., processing temperature, ingredient transfer rate, mixing speed ), and process outputs (the product and its quantity resulting from a single batch). Formulas can be used to distinguish between different products or different product "grades" defined by the same procedure.
